content: I'm trying to install the latest notepad++ plug-in (1.0.33) and the installer appears to work, but I don't have FHIR listed in my plugin menu item. I can't see any error log that would point out why it isn't visible. And I did restart my Notepad++. Anyone out there successfully installed notepad++ 7.6 and the fhir plug-in?
okay, solved it myself. the plugin works with 7.5.8 but not 7.5.9 or 7.6.
I managed to get it working with 7.5.9, but I do not know how. It involved installing, uninstalling and reinstalling.
when you install notepadd++ you choose whether it will load plug-ins from the appdata diretory
I now remember that my problems were trying to get Notepad++ plugin manager to play with the FHIR plugin. I gave up on plugin manager.
